thread.title: Custome A. J. Blount
thread.title_full: Burgers' Smokehouse reviewed by Custome A. J. Blount

author: Custome A. J. Blount
title: Custome A. J. Blount
text: I'm sure that, as usual, my family and I will enjoy everything I ordered. However, I was disappointed that the online offered ride along didn't match the item it was paired with. I would have liked the offer to have been clearer.
